author: wn.com
title: TAQA completes Ghana power plant expansion (TAQA - Abu Dhabi National Energy Company PJSC)
text: ( Source : TAQA - Abu Dhabi National Energy Company PJSC) Driven by a strong performance, TAQA achieved underlying revenues of AED 23.0 billion in 2014, an 8.6% increase over 2013. This resulted in the Company 's highest ever EBITDA of AED
